content.introduction: PINA stands for "Person Identification" and is a small web application to experiment with cloud-based person and facial recognition APIs like (Azure Cognitive Services or Google Cloud Vision).
content.description: The pina colada is a sweet cocktail made with rum, coconut cream or coconut milk, and pineapple juice, usually served either blended or shaken with ice. It may be garnished with either a pineapple wedge, maraschino cherry, or both.

messages.permissionDeniedError: Permission denied. Please refresh and give permission.
